method.name: flickr.people.getPublicGroups
method.description: Returns the list of public groups a user is a member of.
method.response: <groups> <group nsid="34427469792@N01" name="FlickrCentral" admin="0" eighteenplus="0" /> <group nsid="37114057624@N01" name="Cal's Test Group" admin="1" eighteenplus="0" /> <group nsid="34955637532@N01" name="18+ Group" admin="1" eighteenplus="1" /> </groups>
method.explanation: The admin attribute indicates whether the user is an administrator of the group. The eighteenplus attribute indicates if the group is visible to members over 18 only.

arguments.argument: Your API application key. See here for more details.
The NSID of the user to fetch groups for.
